ConfirmQuit.en-us: Quit the game and return to the main menu?

ResetGameMessage.en-us: Are you sure you want to reset? All progress will be lost.

IntroJumpRope.en-us: I tawt we should jump rope together!

TutorialJumpRope.en-us: Jump rope until time runs out!

IntroDodgeball.en-us: How about we play some dodge ball!

TutorialDodgeball.en-us: Hit Elmer Fudd as many times as possible before the time runs out!

IntroTicTacToe.en-us: Think you can beat me in Tic Tac Toe do ya?

TutorialTicTacToe.en-us: Get three in a row to win!

Goal2TicTacToe.en-us: Don't lose! Only win or draw

IntroBasketball.en-us: Eh, what's up Doc? Got time to shoot some hoops?

TutorialBasketball.en-us: Get the ball into the hoop! Earn bonus points by not touching the rim.

TutorialFootRace.en-us: Avoid obstacles and run as far as possible before time runs out!

FinalGameComplete.en-us: You aced all the games! You're the school yard champion! Congratulations!
